title: Southeast Asia’s ‘incredibly dynamic’ Islamic finance market is drawing in non-Islamic players
description: Mambu, an Amsterdam based, SaaS firm is banking on the region's younger people gravitating towards financial solutions that adhere to Islamic principles.

title: Crypto firms urge UK to form national stablecoin strategy to avoid falling behind U.S.
description: In an open letter, several major crypto firms said the U.K. "must act now to avoid being a rule-taker rather than a rule-maker in the digital asset era."
